enabled.name: Include Canvas Tokens On Timebased Refreshed
enabled.hint: When enabled will not just check the party, but also all tokens on the canvas to see to refresh their uses

aeon-pearly-white.name: Automate Aeon Stone (Pearly White Spindle)
aeon-pearly-white.hint: Automates the healing for aeon stone pearly white spindle (currently only out of combat
